name: SlimeFlag
description:
If the game crashes after the first level, use a different browser! (The game is just a game for the gamejam, not a complete product)

This game is for the jabrils game jam.

The slime's  aren't in their homes for some reason, so you just move them to their house, which is for some odd reason a flag.

Credits:

Programming and game art by waleed.
Soundtrack by SOFVIIC93.
"Jumping and walking becomes less effective as you use it" idea by lulzertheforth.
